explanation: To complete the task of putting a heated tomato in the fridge, we will need the Pan to heat the tomato, the Knife or ButterKnife to cut the tomato if necessary, the Plate to put the tomato on after heating, the Bowl to briefly cook the tomato for 3 seconds, the PepperShaker to add flavor if desired, the Spoon to transfer the tomato to the fridge, and of course the Tomato itself. The other objects in the environment are not directly related to completing this task.
